::Striker::

Striker nods. "The parts could be usefull, but there's an easier way of 
getting them. The Cybertronian Fire is a battle cruiser, it might have a 
space-worthy shuttle or two."

He looks around, "Either way, I doubt the hull of the Ark would hold."
